tips.text: Check for discounts on Walt Disney World room rates, with up to $200 off per night when purchasing a ticket package or up to 25% off regular room rates in early 2025, and up to 35% off for annual passholders.

tips.text: If planning a trip, be aware that the peak pricing for individual Lightning Lanes at Seven Dwarves Mine Train, Tron Lightcycle / Run, and Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind are increasing later this month.
